docs.lead_paragraph: A major measles outbreak traced to Disneyland has brought criticism down on the small but vocal movement among parents to opt out of vaccinations for their children.

headline.main: Measles Outbreak Casts Spotlight on Anti-Vaccine Movement
headline.print_headline: Measles Outbreak Casts Spotlight on Anti-Vaccine Movement
